content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal experiences, but I have access to information sources that can help answer your question. The wait time for appointments at Kaiser hospitals in California can vary depending on the specialty, location, and demand for services. Generally speaking, some patients have reported long wait times for non-urgent appointments or specialist referrals, while others have reported prompt scheduling and efficient care delivery. Kaiser Permanente has implemented several measures to reduce wait times, including same-day appointments, online scheduling, and telemedicine options. Finally, patients should consult with their primary care physician or healthcare provider to determine the most appropriate and timely care for their needs.
